title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 

Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 3) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 234 of 2020) is 
amended by the substitution of “the 10th day of August 2020” for “the 20th 
day of July 2020”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

18 July, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st July, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [252] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 234 of 2020) will 
remain in operation until 10 August 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [252]
